page.title: 09NEW ENGLAND CARAVAN SITE
page.content: New England Caravan Site is one of a number of Caravan Sites which have been developed recently in this area. The site which used to be a quarry, lies in a picturesque position in attractive countryside near Capenwray and at a point where the Carnforth to Skipton Railway line crosses by viaduct over both the River Keer and the Lancaster Canal.There are at preasent 202 caravans on the site. Many of the owners live in Southern Lancashire and use their caravans at week ends. The site is well maintained and has an outdoor{swimming pool,}a {children's paddling pool,playground} and a {small shop.}
